acknowledgement: Extinction Rebellion Australia pays respect to the traditional owners and custodians who looked after this land for tens of thousands of years. We acknowledge that this land was stolen from them and that sovereignty has never been ceded.
disclaimer:
### Made with love and rage

Extinction Rebellion (XR) is a do-it-together movement. All our design and artwork can be used non-commercially for the purpose of planet saving. This does not mean creating merchandise for fundraising or sending XR a percentage of your sales. We do not endorse or create any merchandise and we will pursue and prosecute anyone who does. The Extinction Symbol was designed in 2011 by street artist ESP, who loans XR usage on the same basis: [www.extinctionsymbol.info](https://www.extinctionsymbol.info)
